name: Sarah Chen
blurb: Led our team to victory in the McKinsey case competition, developing a comprehensive digital transformation strategy for a Fortune 500 retailer. Now interning at Bain & Company.

name: Marcus Rodriguez
blurb: Spearheaded our AI strategy research project, analyzing emerging technologies and their strategic implications for enterprise companies. Accepted full-time offer at Microsoft.

name: Priya Patel
blurb: Organized our largest networking event of the year, connecting 150+ students with industry professionals. Secured summer internship at Deloitte Consulting.

name: Alex Thompson
blurb: Managed our consulting project with a local startup, delivering strategic recommendations that helped secure their Series A funding. Joining Amazon's strategy team.
